title: Nifty: Ready To Take Decisive Move Amid Growing Indecisiveness
text:
On analysis of the movements of , in different time frames, I find that the Nifty 50 looks ready to take decisive move on October 24th – 25th, 2019, after trading in a range-bound manner since last few trading session; amid growing uncertainty due to political moves to linger on different deals. No doubt that the global equity markets look under bearish pressure has been constantly trying to take decisive breakout on either side; seem to be waiting for decisive action on Brexit Deal, Sino-U.S. Tariff Trade and Modi-Trump Trade Deal. But silence over these deals looks evident enough to enhance uncertainty which looks too encouraging for bugs; and look ready to move above $1524 during this week, if the current indecisiveness continues to extend exhaustion in global equity markets.

Finally, I conclude that a decisive move in , on either side – above the level of 11,784 and below the level of 11,351 on October 24th – 25th, 2019 will result in a directional move during the upcoming week. No doubt that the U.S. equity indices struggled a lot till closing, but hardly gain any momentum; which enhances the probabilities of the prevalence of bearishness till the clear view on gloomy economic and political moves.
